alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:04PM CDT until July 14 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WOOD AND SOUTHWESTERN MARATHON COUNTIES... At 704 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Spencer, or 17 miles northeast of Neillsville, moving east at 30 mph. Additional thunderstorms were also occurring ahead of the severe thunderstorm across northern Wood County. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marshfield, Rozellville and Hewitt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
